verbose_text: In conclusion, the present study showed that the total glycosides of rhodiola were able to suppress the sepsis induced overexpression of TIPE2 in mice, inhibit the upregulated expression of the apoptosis promoting proteins Fas and FasL, increase the decreased expression of the apoptosis inhibiting protein Bcl-2, decrease the enhanced T-lymphocyte apoptosis, increase the decreased numbers of thymus T lymphocytes and CD3 +, CD4 + and CD4 + / CD8 + T-lymphocyte sub-sets, further enhance the Th1 cytokines IFNgamma, IL-2 and IL-12, and enhance the host 's immunity.
evidence: TIPE2 in mice, inhibit the upregulated expression of the apoptosis-promoting proteins Fas and FasL, increase the decreased expression of the apoptosis-inhibiting protein Bcl-2, decrease the enhanced T-lymphocyte apoptosis, increase the decreased numbers of thymus T lymphocytes and CD3 + , CD4 +  and CD4 + /CD8 +  T-lymphocyte sub-sets, further enhance the Th1 cytokines IFNgamma, IL-2
